Columns.Description: The time (UTC) this event was generated
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The time (UTC) the table usage statistics operation started
Columns.Name: StartedOn

Columns.Description: Earliest extent time of the table
Columns.Name: MinCreatedOn

Columns.Description: Lastest extent time of the table
Columns.Name: MaxCreatedOn

Columns.Description: The name of the application that invoked the command
Columns.Name: ApplicationName

Columns.Description: Principal that invoked the query like 'aaduser=USER_ID;TENANT'
Columns.Name: Principal

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
